Uses of Package
com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation

Packages that use com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation
com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation.validator   
 

Classes in com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation used by com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation.validator
CheckContent
          Define annotation to validate content of a string, elements below are checked:
Character continuous repetition Character list against characters whitelist Not others check like range,max,min length,... are implemented because there others existing annotations that can do the job (see link below).
NoLdap
          Define annotation to validate content of a string,
check that the string do not contains any character that can be interpreted in a LDAP filter expression.
NoTag
          Define annotation to validate content of a string, check that the string contains no HTML/XML tags
OnlyPrintableCharacter
          Define annotation to validate content of a string, check that the string contains only printable characters.
